description: Pauses a specified Dev Environment and places it in a non-running state. Stopped Dev Environments do not consume compute minutes.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: projectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the Dev Environment.
